General.Name: Carriesoft Co. Ltd
General.Description: Carriesoft Co., Ltd. creates and publishes contents for kids and family worldwide. It owns CarrieTV, a TV station, which broadcasts video contents to IPTV, OTT, and cable TV service providers; publishes mobile games; creates a series of a family musical event that includes story, dance, lyrics, and music; operates Carrie Kids Café, an indoor play for pre-school children; and provides various classes at Carrie Kids Café, such as ballet, cooking, painting, and craft. The company is based in Seoul, South Korea.
